title: Live map - Sofia Traffic

sidebar.title: Live map
sidebar.siteNotice: The site is a personal hobby project and is not officially affiliated with Sofia Urban Mobility Center in any way.

settings.noCircleMarkers: Do not minify markers (will slow down the map)

noArrivals: No more arrivals for the day.

vehicles.title: Searching for vehicles
vehicles.description: Search by line, model or fleet number.

stops.title: Searching for stops
stops.description: Search using the stop name or code.

about.description1: I am BPilot253 and I created this site absolutely free of charge as a personal hobby project. It is not officially affiliated with Sofia Urban Mobility Center in any way.
about.description2: The site allows you to track all public transport vehicles in Sofia, their routes and next arrivals at the stops.
about.description3: For feedback and suggestions you can post in the forum thread.
about.forumTopic: Thread in the GT Sofia forum
